title: Roton assisted vortex nucleation in isotopically pure superfluid 4He.
abstract: Measurements are presented of the rate nu at which negative ions nucleate quantised vortex rings in isotopically pure superfluid 4He for temperatures 0.3 < T < 0.8 K and electric fields 6 x 10^4 < E < 1.5 X 10^6 V/m. It is shown that there is a temperature dependent component of nu, which is accurately proportional to the thermal roton density provided that due allowance is made for the drag arising from ion-excitation scattering

        Roton assisted vortex nucleation in isotopically pure superfluid 4He.</dc:title><dc:creator>
        Bowley, R. M.</dc:creator><dc:creator>
        McClintock, Peter V. E.</dc:creator><dc:creator>
        Moss, F. E.</dc:creator><dc:creator>
        Nancolas, G. G.</dc:creator><dc:subject>
        QC Physics</dc:subject><dc:description>
        Measurements are presented of the rate nu at which negative ions nucleate quantised vortex rings in isotopically pure superfluid 4He for temperatures 0.3 < T < 0.8 K and electric fields 6 x 10^4 < E < 1.5 X 10^6 V/m. It is shown that there is a temperature dependent component of nu, which is accurately proportional to the thermal roton density provided that due allowance is made for the drag arising from ion-excitation scattering.</dc:description><dc:date>
        1981</dc:date><dc:type>
        Journal Article</dc:type><dc:type>
        PeerReviewed</dc:type><dc:relation>

        Bowley, R. M. and McClintock, Peter V. E. and Moss, F. E. and Nancolas, G. G. (1981) Roton assisted vortex nucleation in isotopically pure superfluid 4He. Physica B: Condensed Matter, 107. pp. 571-572. ISSN 0921-4526</dc:identifier><dc:relation>
